Four other committee members raised at least $100,000 for Bush's campaign: Bill DeWitt and Mercer Reynolds, co-chairs of the Ohio-based investment firm of Reynolds, DeWitt and Company; Brad Freeman, a California investor; and Florida developer Al Hoffman, who was finance chairman for Jeb Bush's gubernatorial campaign and chairman of his inaugural committee
